characteristics.name: Other
characteristics.value: When manifesting or denying a psychic power, first select a model in this unit -- measure range, visibility, etc. from this model. If this unit sufferes Perils of the Warp, it suffers D3 mortal wounds as described in the core rules, but units within 6" will only suffer damage if the Perfils of the Warp causes the last model in the manifesting unit to be slain.
